description: Enhanced AI instructions for code explanation and generation

code_explanation.objective: Provide clear, concise code explanations in structured markdown format
rules: Use markdown formatting with clear headings
Keep explanations concise - one or two sentences per point
Focus on key functionality and purpose
Explain functions, classes, and key constructs briefly
Describe control structures clearly and simply
Highlight important patterns and design decisions
NO comments in the output, only structured markdown
Focus on clarity rather than comprehensive detail

code_generation.objective: Generate clean, executable code without any explanatory text
rules: ONLY generate raw code, NO explanations or comments
Ensure syntactically correct and fully executable code
Generate only what is specifically requested
Do not add extra code not requested

languages.python: PEP 8 compliant, use f-strings, type hints, and modern Python features
languages.javascript: ES6+ syntax, use const/let, arrow functions, async/await, modules
languages.typescript: Strict typing, interfaces, generics, modern TS features
languages.java: Proper OOP structure, access modifiers, exception handling, Java 11+ features
languages.c: ANSI C standard, K&R style, proper memory management, includes
languages.cpp: Modern C++17+, STL containers, smart pointers, RAII principles

output.explain: Structured markdown with clear sections, NO comments in output
output.generate: Raw executable code only, NO comments or explanations
